personalInfo.name: Khushboo Singh
personalInfo.about: I am currently pursuing a Master’s in Computer Science at Stony Brook University, where my research focuses on the transformative potential of Natural Language Processing (NLP) in modeling human behavior and affective states. My goal is to develop emotionally aware AI systems capable of interpreting complex psychological contexts using multimodal data, addressing challenges such as mental health diagnostics and enhancing emotional intelligence. Building on advancements in sentiment analysis and emotion recognition, I aim to create robust, interpretable NLP systems that bridge technical innovation and societal well-being, preparing for a future where technology serves as a force for inclusion and transformation.

education.degree: B. Tech. in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science

academicProjects.title1: Investigating the Efficacy of Open Large Language Models in Understanding Human Psychological States and Traits
academicProjects.title: Master’s Thesis at Human Language Analysis Beings (HLAB), Stony Brook University
details: Utilized a wide range of LLM architectures—including RoBERTa, BERT, DeBERTa, GPT-2, XLNet, Llama2, Llama3, T5, and FLAN T5—to analyze the Data Science for Unhealthy Drinking (DS4UD) dataset, focusing on individuals with alcohol and substance use disorders.

Conducted Multi-Level Psychological Analysis to predict mental health indicators, personality traits, and emotional states (e.g., valence, arousal, anxiety, depression, and BIG-5 traits) by performing analyses at individual message level, two-week intervals, and comprehensive user profiles, uncovering temporal and contextual language patterns.

Assessed the effectiveness of different LLM types—autoencoders, autoregressive models, and encoder-decoder models—and contrasted embedding-based methods with prompting techniques to determine optimal approaches for modelling latent psychological constructs.

Developed a hybrid NLP and time-series forecasting model to predict future prices of commodities supported by economically sound explanations for price movements by integrating numerical data (prices) and textual data (EIA reports).

Developed a time-series forecasting model utilizing a Time Series Transformer (TST), achieving MSE of 0.097 and MAPE of 0.26 when forecasting oil and natural gas prices, significantly outperforming traditional ARIMA models

Pioneered Instruction Tuning using LLAMA2 (7B) and GPT2 (355M) models to generate economically sound explanations for price movements, implementing Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT) with LoRA on LLAMA2 (reducing trainable parameters to 12.4% of the total) and full fine-tuning on GPT2.

Developed cascading and joint model architectures to integrate outputs from the Time Series Transformer and LLAMA2, enhancing interpretability and robustness in commodity price forecasting and explanation tasks, thereby effectively bridging the gap between machine learning and economic analysis.

Developed an advanced medical document summarization system that combines LLaMA3, few-shot learning, and Chain-of-Thought prompting to generate step-by-step, concise, and legally relevant summaries tailored for lawyers.

Designed and implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline, integrating Facebook AI Similarity Search (FAISS) for efficient similarity search and PubMedBERT embeddings for domain-specific understanding, retrieving accurate context from datasets to improve the quality and relevance of summaries.

Conducted comprehensive benchmarking by experimenting with state-of-the-art models such as T5, Flan-T5, BART, BioBART, and ChatGPT-4, evaluating contextual accuracy, domain specificity, and legal relevance to optimize model performance and workflow efficiency.

academicProjects.title1: Privacy Compliance Framework for Medical Mobile Apps
details: Developed a custom GPT model using OpenAI API to detect conditions and negations related to Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in privacy policies, achieving an 85% accuracy in identifying personal data mentions and discrepancies between privacy policies and app permissions.
Utilized dependency parsing to systematically analyze conditions within privacy documents.
Implemented zero-shot and few-shot prompt engineering techniques to extract critical privacy compliance information.

academicProjects.title1: Analysis of Substance Use Treatment Admissions
details: Utilizing Java, developed two key Hadoop programs to process and sort admissions by age and year, revealing insightful patterns over time, and efficiently identified distinct CBSAs using Hadoop's identity mapper and reducer concepts in Treatment Episode Data Set covering the years 2000 to 2019 (5.37 GB), to identify trends in admissions across different age groups and to pinpoint the unique Core Based Statistical Areas represented in the data.
Replicated the age-year analysis using Spark to demonstrate improved processing speeds and data handling capabilities.

Developed an advanced automated attendance system in Python using computer vision and machine learning algorithms for real-time facial recognition, implementing Haar cascades with OpenCV’s XML classifiers for robust face detection.

Designed a multi-algorithm face recognition system by integrating Eigenface (PCA), Fisherface (LDA), and Local Binary Pattern Histogram (LBPH) in an ensemble model, enhancing accuracy through feature combination and comparative analysis.

professionalExperience.role: Senior Research Aide at The Research Foundation for SUNY
description: Utilized transformer-based language models (RoBERTa) and topic modeling, alongside OpenAI’s Whisper, to analyze linguistic patterns and uncover themes indicative of mental health conditions such as Post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), depression (PHQ-9), and alcohol use (AUDIT) in 9/11 responders' speech data.

Developed and optimized AI-driven NLP and machine learning models to correlate linguistic features with clinical assessments, identifying sentiment and thematic elements predictive of PTSD severity, contributing to early detection and intervention.

Integrated multimodal data—language, audio, and video—to advance the understanding of psychological diagnostics, supporting the World Trade Center Health Program’s mission of improving mental well-being for individuals and communities.

professionalExperience.role: Research Software Engineer at Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi – Automation Industry Association Foundation for Smart Manufacturing
description: Developed a Cyber-physical system using Smart Manufacturing concepts, aiming to explore and enhance assembly processes automatically by a robot without requiring human involvement. The system comprised three key phases: storage and loading, storage and insertion of axisymmetric parts, and assembly and screwing of prismatic parts, all managed by a robotic arm. Technology stack: Python, OPC UA Communication protocol, Amazon EC2, Firestore.
Created a Digital Simulator and a Real-Time Dashboard using ReactJS for assembly machines, enabling the rapid testing of innovative manufacturing concepts without needing physical machines.
Developed a Mobile Application to calculate the Overall Equipment Effectiveness of the Lathe Machine, improving real-time tracking of machine efficiency.
Mentored three summer interns working on the Real Time Dashboard development.

professionalExperience.role: Software Engineer at Indeses Business Venture
description: Architected and developed full-stack cross-platform Android and iOS applications utilizing Dart and Flutter, for E-Commerce, Education, and Fintech domains:  Eduk8me, TCHRTalk, Kalaam Telecom

Developed and integrated a Custom ChatBot using OpenAI API within a Flutter app, enabling conversational AI features with natural language understanding and real-time responses, enhancing user engagement.
Mentored two interns in Full Stack Mobile Development, providing deep-dive training on client-server architecture, stateful/stateless widget creation, and API endpoint integration in Flutter.
Managed deployment on both Google Play Store and Apple App Store, overseeing version control, debugging, and ensuring App Store compliance for smooth, timely releases.

professionalExperience.role: Research Intern at Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur
description: Numerical Analysis and Optimization of the conversion efficiency of the Perovskite solar cells were carried out to obtain a maximum efficiency of 23.74%.

professionalExperience.role: Research Intern at  Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur
description: Performed Image Analysis by implementing Histogram Equalization and CDF-based transformations, which resulted in a 25% improvement in image contrast as measured by visual clarity in medical and satellite images.

Presented a seminar covering the impact of image processing methods such as negative transformations, power-law transformations, and histogram matching, demonstrating up to 40% enhancement in image detail and clarity.
